abilities.title: Fan out
abilities.text: At the start of this Unit's activation, one character in this Unit or another allied Spy character may . Low Blow Choose a character in this Unit and an enemy character it is Engaged with. Push the chosen enemy character 2 away from the chosen allied character. Then, Push the chosen allied character 2 Toward the chosen enemy character. After all moves are resolved, this Unit may make a focus action. Fearless and Inventive When a character in this Unit makes a attack as part of a combat action, before dice are rolled, this Unit may use this ability. Add 2 dice to the attack for each enemy character, other than the target, that is not Wounded and is engaged with one or more characters in this Unit. I want fifty thousand, no less When a character in this Unit Wounds an enemy Primary Unit , gain an additional Momentum token unless that Unit's controlling player spends .
